title: Rams-Seahawks TNF Recap: Russell Wilson exits with finger injury while Stafford stays in + A DOUBLE PUNT!  (Football 10/8)
description:
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech offer their immediate reactions to a Week 5 of Thursday Night Football, as the Rams defeated the Seahawks 26-17. It was another whacky Seattle home primetime game, and the Superfriends are here to cover all the action. First and foremost, the season of Breech continues as he gets the chance to break down a double punt! Was that legal or not? Also, the major storyline out of this one is Russell Wilson's injury and how it could impact his availability in the coming weeks. We have to talk about the winning team as well, so don't worry, the Rams are indeed covered in this episode...

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
